content.rendered:
Please see the tryout information for spring sports teams below.  For specific team information, please contact coaches directly.  Click here for coach contact information.

UNIFIED BASKETBALL
An informational meeting to be held at the end of March (TBD).  More information to follow.

BASEBALL
Varsity and Junior Varsity: March 13th, 14th and 15th from 4:30-7:00 High School Blue Gym
Freshman:  Tuesday, March 21st  through Thursday, March 23rd West Side Rec 3-5:00.  In the case of inclement weather, tryouts will be at the high school, gym location TBD
Modified:  Starts Monday, March 27th – Monday, Wednesday and Friday 4:30-6 in the main and back gyms, Tuesday/Thursday 3-4:30 in the main and back gyms

SOFTBALL
Varsity and Junior Varsity:  Tryouts are Monday through Thursday, March 13-16th in the blue gym at the high school as follows:  Monday 3-5, Tuesday 3-5:30, Wednesday, 3-5:30, Thursday 4:30-7:30
Modified: Monday, Wednesday and Friday 3-4:30 Back Gym, Tuesday/Thursday 4:30-6 in the Main gym

GIRLS LACROSSE
Varsity and Junior Varsity:  Monday through Wednesday, March 13-15th 4:30-6:30 on the high school turf field
Modified:  Starts Monday, March 27th – Monday, Wednesday and Friday 3-4:30 in the Main Gym, Tuesday/Thursday 4:30-6 in the back gym

BOYS LACROSSE
Varsity – March 13th and 14th from 3-5:00 on the high school turf field
Junior Varsity – March 13th, 14th and 15th from 6:30-8:30 on the high school turf field
Modified – March 27 to March 30 – Time and location is TBD, bring full equipment
Player Meeting Wednesday, March 1st at 2:30 in Gym F at Maple
 Informational Parent Meeting on Monday, March 20th at 7:00 in the cafeteria a Maple

BOYS OUTDOOR TRACK
Varsity/Junior Varsity – https://www.saratogaxctf.com/  Please contact Chris Conley, Shane Zanetti or Tom Reilly with questions
Modified – Monday, March 27th , time and location TBD

GIRLS OUTDOOR TRACK
Varsity/Junior Varsity – No cuts, season starts on March 13th   Meet everyday from 3-5:00 white gym.
Modified – Season starts March 27th Meet everyday from 3-5:00 in the white gym.

BOYS TENNIS
Varsity – Monday, March 13th at the Wilton YMCA from 3-4:00.  No cuts.  Bring tennis racket, water and appropriate clothing.
Junior Varsity – Monday, March 13th from 3:00-4:30 – HS tennis courts if weather permits, TA if practice is moved inside.  No cuts.  Bring tennis racket, water and appropriate clothing.
